channel.title: For iPhone Users
channel.description: I plugged my phone into my charger at around 5 AM before I went to sleep. It was working just fine. I checked it today, and it will show me the boot logo [img]http://www.mobilewhack.com/wp-content/images/2009/04/apple_chrome_logo.jpg[/img] Then it will go to my wallpaper. After that, it will work for about a second, and then freeze. After 5 minutes of being frozen, it will just go back to the boot logo and repeat. It's been doing this for about 6 hours now, maybe more. Who here knows what's wrong with it, and what I should do? No, I'm not going to change to the Crackberry or Android or whatever. Any posts like that won't be taken into consideration.

item.title: For iPhone Users
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

I let it die and it works now.
Lock pl0x somebody

I also recommend installing SSH on your phone, and an SSH client on your computer.[/quote]

I plugged my phone into my charger at around 5 AM before I went to sleep. It was working just fine.
I checked it today, and it will show me the boot logo
Then it will go to my wallpaper. After that, it will work for about a second, and then freeze. After 5 minutes of being frozen, it will just go back to the boot logo and repeat. It’s been doing this for about 6 hours now, maybe more.
Who here knows what’s wrong with it, and what I should do?
No, I’m not going to change to the Crackberry or Android or whatever. Any posts like that won’t be taken into consideration.
